content: चंक्रमणं {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [क्रम् यङ् ल्युट् यञो लुक् <ls>Tv.</ls>] {@--1@} Moving about, taking exercise. {@--2@} Going slowly or crookedly. {@--3@} Moving or going about, walking; विष चक्रमण रात्रौ <ls>Chāṇ. 97</ls>; चक्रे स चक्रनिभचंक्रमणच्छलेन <ls>N. 1. 144.</ls> {@--4@} Going slowly or tortuously. {@--5@} Leap, jump, spring; <ls>Pt. 4.</ls>
